channel.title: CVE Feed for Smart TV Box -- firmware version prior to 1300
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Smart TV Box -- firmware version prior to 1300

item.title: CVE-2019-6005|2024-08-04T20:09:23.998Z -- smart%20tv%20box -- firmware%20version%20prior%20to%201300
item.description: Smart TV Box firmware version prior to 1300 allows remote attackers to bypass access restriction to conduct arbitrary operations on the device without user's intent, such as installing arbitrary software or changing the device settings via Android Debug Bridge port 5555/TCP.
